example.name: and again
example.text: Ford should meet the deadline easily.

roleset.name: kennenlernen-- come upon, become acquainted with initially

example.name: one-way
example.text: Along the way he meets a solicitous Christian chauffeur who offers the hero God's phone number.
example.arg: a solicitous Christian chauffeur who offers the hero God's phone number

example.name: reflexive
example.text: John and Mary met each other at a cocktail party.

example.name: non-personal party
example.text: Argentine negotiator Carlos Carballo will meet with banks this week.

example.name: all parties in arg0
example.text: The economic and foreign ministers of 12 Asian and Pacific nations will meet in Australia next week to discuss global trade as well as regional matters such as transportation and telecommunications.
example.arg: The economic and foreign ministers of 12 Asian and Pacific nations
to discuss global trade as well as regional matters such as transportation and telecommunications

example.name: Tectonic Plates meeting
example.text: Indonesia , with over 230 million population and 17,000 islands , sits at a vulnerable zone so called '' the Pacific Ring of Fire '' where-1 two continental plates , stretching from the Western Hemisphere through Japan and Southeast Asia *ICH*-3, meet [that cause frequent volcanic movements]-3 *T*-1.
example.arg: two continental plates , stretching from the Western Hemisphere through Japan and Southeast Asia *ICH*-3,

roleset.name: answer, respond to

example.name: Anwer a challenge
example.text: And they met the challenge with a brilliant and multifaceted campaign that garnered acclaim from many sources.
example.arg: with a brilliant and multifaceted campaign that garnered acclaim from many sources

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: A much better resolution would have been a hard resolution on non proliferation and disarmament in the region , which meant India and Pakistan had to disarm and Israel had to disarm , and [any moves by any country in the region towards getting nuclear weapons]-1 would be met [*-1] by international air strikes .

example.name: another with args 1 and 2
example.text: [An anecdote about his meeting with a wounded soldier]-1 was met [*-1] with a tepid response, until he described the soldier's determination to recover .
example.arg: until he described the soldier's determination to recover

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'meet' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus

roleset.name: get together

example.name: Plural arg 0
example.text: so we met up just after work and got there early.

roleset.note: Roleset for 'meet up' based on instances in webtext 2.5.
